title: Reconcile Property Trust Account
description: At month-end, the property manager must reconcile the property's bank trust account with the records in the software.

tasks.description: Download the monthly bank statement for the property trust account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the bank statement.

tasks.description: Compare each transaction on the bank statement to the transactions recorded in the property management software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent systematically checks off matching transactions.

tasks.description: Identify and resolve any discrepancies (e.g., a bank fee not recorded, a cleared check not marked as such).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds and corrects all discrepancies, resulting in a balanced reconciliation.
